About TAHC

The American Hail Company is an automotive hail damage repair company based out of Seguin, TX that specializes in paintless dent repair (PDR).

The Challenge

TAHC engaged Tempest to help drive qualified leads from recent automotive hail damage victims.

The Solution

We created and managed targeted campaigns on Facebook and Instagram to drive consistent leads after every hail storm within their service area.

Facebook & Instagram Ads

We first helped TAHC get an online presence on social media. After creating their Facebook Page & Instagram profile, we were then able start our paid media campaigns.

"After working with Tempest, we've more than quadrupled the number of cars we service per year. Hands down the best business decision I ever made.”
